Html: Is it possible to use goblin in XNA for Windows phone 7  ??

You'll need xna studio 4.0 for wp7. It seems that you'll need to wait until the official release for Goblin for XNA 4.0. (the beta is already running, but i don't know for sure if you can run the samples on your phone, i do see some things happening.)

It won't work right out of Goblin XNA 4.0 for the release we will make. We have a working version for WM7, but we will release it much later after the Goblin XNA 4.0 release. 

Ohan
